title: Divine Peacock Nakshi Haaram with Ruby Accent and Basra Pearls
materials: Basra Pearls. Meticulously crafted with fine Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This exquisite haaram features a majestic peacock (Mayura) design, intricately crafted using traditional Nakshi work techniques. The central paisley motif is encrusted with sparkling CZ stones, leading to a pendant embellished with a vibrant ruby. Delicate Basra pearls dangle gracefully, adding a touch of sophistication. The necklace chain is carefully designed for comfort and features a secure clasp.
colors: Predominantly gold with dazzling white from the CZ stones
a pop of rich red from the ruby
and subtle ivory hue from the Basra pearls
creating a harmonious and opulent color palette.
occasions: festive celebrations like Sankranthi and Diwali
as well as upscale social events. A timeless piece that enhances both traditional Kanjeevaram sarees and contemporary evening wear.
description: A stunning blend of tradition and contemporary design, this haaram showcases the artistry of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The intricate Nakshi work and vibrant ruby add a touch of regal elegance, while the use of high-quality CZ stones ensures exceptional sparkle and brilliance. The classic peacock design holds significant cultural symbolism, representing beauty, grace, and prosperity. This heirloom-worthy piece is a true investment in timeless style.
